metadata.title: PICES Scientific Report No. 2 (1995) - The Okhotsk Sea and Oyashio Region (Report of Working Group I) / edited by Lynne D. Talley and Yutaka Nagata
metadata.description:
Report documents the physical oceanographic aspects of the Okhotsk Sea and Oyashio area including water mass modification, the influence on the subarctic Pacific and Oyashio, and sea ice observation and formation.  The report also provides a list of institutions holding Okhotsk Sea and Oyashio region data.
   [ LC Call No. GC781 .P535 no.2. ISBN 0969842023 ]
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To present a review of the importance of the Okhotsk Sea and Oyashio Region on the ventilation of the North Pacific Ocean, such as the formation of the North Pacific intermediate water.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: None Planned
